simplified: 丑媳妇早晚也得见公婆

pronunciation.pinyin: chǒu xí fù zǎo wǎn yě děi jiàn gōng pó
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: chou3 xi2 fu4 zao3 wan3 ye3 dei3 jian4 gong1 po2

details.simplified: 丑媳妇早晚也得见公婆
details.traditional: 醜媳婦早晚也得見公婆

meanings.value: the ugly daughter-in-law must sooner or later meet her parents-in-law
fig. it's not something you can avoid forever
